caption.p: Regional data on air quality levels: A) nitrogen dioxide (NO 2); B) particulate matter of 2.5 μm or less (PM 2.5); C) particulate matter of 2.5–10 μm (PM 10). Data are referred to the means of values of last four years (2016–2019), expressed as μg/m 3 (obtained and elaborated from the European Environmental Agency, accessed on 6 April, EEA, 2020).
